views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9 and 10

Set a default mail client which will be used to compose emails instead of apple's Mail app.

Currently Supported Mail Clients: Inbox, Gmail, Spark, Outlook, Airmail, and Yahoo Mail.

Configure Options from Settings

Please, considerto the author to support the development of future tweaks.

Resolve issue with preferences for some users after installing the tweak for the first time Choose apps which should use the standard Apple Mail app i.e. Blacklist (03/29/2017) Add support for Yahoo mail client

(03/25/2017) Prevent Cydia from opening Compose View 2 times
